Title: Requires courts to consider whether an individual poses a risk or threat of physical danger to the safety of any person or the community when imposing a securing order
Summary: Requires courts to consider whether an individual poses a risk or threat of physical danger to the safety of any person or the community when imposing a securing order; makes stalking in the second and third degree a qualifying offense; makes related provisions.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the criminal procedure law, in relation to requiring courts to consider whether an individual poses a risk or threat of physical danger to the safety of any person or the community when imposing a securing order and making certain crimes qualifying offenses
